name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Full Stack Engineer with over 8 years of experience specializing in **React**, **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **Node.js**, and modern web app architecture. Proven expertise in designing and developing high-performance applications with a focus on API design, relational databases, and security best practices. I possess a strong background working with **Next.js** and adept at utilizing design tools such as **Figma**, **Sketch**, and **Photoshop** to create responsive and user-friendly interfaces.
My technical prowess is complemented by my extensive experience in cloud infrastructure, having worked with **AWS** and **Azure** to develop scalable solutions. I have a solid understanding of data manipulation and the importance of building secure applications. Additionally, I have successfully led projects that incorporate advanced design frameworks such as **Three.js** and **GSAP**, yielding engaging user interactions. Driven by a passion for innovation and excellence, I am adept at translating complex requirements into intuitive applications that elevate user experience.
